channel.title: Help
channel.description:
I want to make text that if I click on it will make an object on the ground
i'm thinking about using this code : [code]case <actionbutton id>: c.addSkillXP(100, 1); c.makeGlobalObject(coordX, coordY, objectID, int type); break;[/code]
but it gives error in clickbutton.cfg

item.title: Help
item.dc:creator: @mistakengod mistakengod
item.description:
@mistakengod wrote:

Ok i’ll try it ;p.

well I don’t really what for number I’ve to place in int type.

this is the result :

[code]: 1151);
break;
}
if (c.isAutoButton(actionButtonId))
c.assignAutocast(actionButtonId);
}

}
case <4288>:
c.addSkillXP(100, 1);
c.makeGlobalObject(13577, 500, 500, int type);
break;
}[/code]

4288 is from the musictab code ( got it from this ) :

and this is the total result :

[code]: 1151);
break;
}
if (c.isAutoButton(actionButtonId))
c.assignAutocast(actionButtonId);
}

}[/code]

placed it under the last code…

still gives erros…

Read full topic
